question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-bytecode-verifier/src/absint.rs] [Function: execute_block()] [instr_indexes() soundness] If cfg().instr_indexes() returns incorrect offsets, can this cause instructions to be executed out of order or skipped entirely during verification? (Critical)

(High)
